text: Kristian Ivanov Vigenin (; born 12 June 1975) is a Bulgarian politician. From 2013 until 2014, he was the Minister of Foreign Affairs.Biography at the website of Foreign Ministry of Bulgaria He was elected as a member of the European Parliament in 2007. He left the parliament in 2014. ==References== Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:MEPs for Bulgaria Category:Politicians from Sofia
title: Kristian Vigenin
